author: Frida Ghitis
title: Putin's war was launched on a runway of lies
description: Frida Ghitis writes it is not the first time "big lies" have been spread by leaders. Russian President Vladimir Putin has used disinformation to justify and launch an unprovoked invasion of Ukraine.
content: Editors Note: Frida Ghitis, (@fridaghitis) a former CNN producer and correspondent, is a world affairs columnist. She is a frequent opinion contributor to CNN, a contributing columnist to The Washingâ€¦ [+6881 chars]
